verses.name: Luke 12:48
verses.text: But he that knew not, and did commit things worthy of stripes, shall be beaten with few stripes. For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required: and to whom men have committed much, of him they will ask the more.

verses.name: Luke 12:49
verses.text: I am come to send fire on the earth; and what will I, if it be already kindled?

verses.name: Luke 12:50
verses.text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished!

verses.name: Luke 12:51
verses.text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth? I tell you, Nay; but rather division:
